amendment.description: Amendment sought to require CBO to include as part of their macroeconomic analysis, estimates of the potential impact on HUB ZONE areas as defined by the Small Business Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in Part B of House Report 113-400 to require CBO to include as part of their macroeconomic analysis estimates of the potential impact on HUB ZONE areas as defined by the Small Business Act.

action.text: Amendment (A005) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 185 - 222 (Roll no. 162).
